first_para: Louise Irvine (born 1957, full name Marie-Louise Irvine) is a British general practitioner, health campaigner, and prospective parliamentary candidate. She is standing in the 2015 UK general election for the National Health Action Party in the constituency of South West Surrey.

full.extract: Louise Irvine (born 1957, full name Marie-Louise Irvine) is a British general practitioner, health campaigner, and prospective parliamentary candidate. She is standing in the 2015 UK general election for the National Health Action Party in the constituency of South West Surrey.
full.title: Louise Irvine
